theres free to play, pay to play, pay to win, skills to win games. but this game takes the cake, bleeds to play, a lazy company that covers up issues instead of fixing it, release patches to fix bugs but creates new ones, new dlcs that creates new bugs and bring back old ones. unbalanced and dull boring recycled game play, survivor sit and hold m1, hold w and spam space bar, and then new anti looping killers. creates toxicity through their content creators with swf bully teams, campy tunneling killers, show casing all the "humorous" memes everyone wants to recreate, in turn creates the whole survivor vs killer main argument of the game being one sided. and lets not forget latency issues and ol yea hackers....

Overall, this is one of my favorite games. My whole life I've been a fan or horror movies, so I was so excited to find a game that made those movies a reality. I love the idea of having a team of 4 survivors working together to overcome the killer. I do think there are some ways the game could be improved thought. In my opinion, I believe the killer is overpowered in the beginning, and the survivors are overpowered at the end of the game. I do believe the quirks could be improved as well. And of course, I would love to see new content for the game. Possibly more modern killers, like Jason, Chucky, the Grudge, etc. I also think there should be an option to create your own survivor character so you can feel more a part of the game. Dead by Daylight does host events frequently with the seasons, and they do come out with new stuff frequently and keeps you hooked. So at the end of the day, I recommend this game to all of my friends. This game definitely catches me off-guard sometimes and makes me scream, but I love the adrenaline this game gives the survivors. This game could use some improvement, like anything else. But I will always come back to play this game, and beg my friends to join me.

Иногда можно сесть поиграть, расслабиться. Но в тот раз, когда такое желание возникает чаще всего игра преподносит очередной сюрприз.

After announcement about changing perks, I have no reason to play DBD anymore. As a survivor most player, I really enjoyed stealth play with Iron Will. That's only thing I can do because I'm really suck at being chased. And Dev is going to make Iron Will a garbage. Simply because too many players use that perk so much other than other perks. They made bunch of useless perks in every new character added, and now they are going to nerf most loved perks to make us use other perks. I wish they make other perks better, so we can have more choice. But they just chose easy way.

首先你一打开这款就会遇见很多问题，无网络链接，违反EAC条例，无法保存游戏等等。
当你终于重新上上下下几次，总算进入游戏界面，如果你是单排玩家那你可以开始你的游戏体验。
但如果你是双排，三排，四排玩家那你还需要克服，社交功能不可用的情况。
这些都是不管你开不开加速器都会发生的问题，并且经常发生。
这导致游玩的时间大大消耗在了进入游戏的过程，这个时候已经让人烦心了，当你好不容易进入游戏。
当这局游戏里的遇到了一些守尸，鞭尸的屠夫或者在门前指指点点的人类，那不友好的游戏体验更会加大你的暴躁心情。
玩一款游戏是消磨时间和使人愉悦。
现在，这款游戏只带我烦躁和郁闷。
等你优化做好，把当前的东西搞搞好再说吧

This game is overall a really fun game to play. The bugs and glitches of this game is what also plays apart of making this game fun. I played friday the 13th before this game. My friend told me about dbd. After have played 10 hours of the game I was instantly hooked. I honestly prefer dbd then ft13 (friday the 13th) If you are wondering about purchasing this game I recommend you to buy it.

Edit: Okay I decided to get more in detail about this game considering that a review like I made is honestly probably not going to help. Okay so i am going to describe this game best I can. This game can sometimes make you rage and never want to play this game. But then eventually you'll come back. For me I would recommend playing survivor first then killer only because survivor is less challenging in my opinion. Oh by the way I used to play on Xbox and I'm now transitioning to PC. Once you have learned how to play survivor then you should probably go start killer. Oh yeah I'm really making this game sound great but! There are downsides to this game. If you are playing as killer and lets say you run agitation NOED (No one escapes death) Hex ruin andddd umm Nurse's calling you will probably get called alot of welll bad things. Why you may ask? Well usally if you run these perks you're considered a try hard. I've been called this may times even on Xbox. I don't care what poeple say but I really do find it sad. This rarely ever happens on the survivor side though. Okay now lets get back to the good side of this game. This game has many characters to chose from. Even for free. wether on the killer or survivor side. But you should probably main a certain type of killer only reason why is because each killer has their own unique ability. And you could find that ability usefull or useless. I personally really like Nurse because her blinking ability is really fun to use and for me adds that bit of intensity. My second favorite is Huntress. I like her because you could hit people close or from a far. My favorite survivor is Nea karlsson, Why? Well because of a youtuber named No0b3 My least favorite killer and survivor is Ash and then legion. ANywyas now I'm going to talk about load in times. Now for survivor you could easily get in a game in less then 30 seconds. For killer though it could maybe even take a hour. My longest wait time is 35 minutes. Now for my ratings


Graphics:7.5/10
Killers and Survivors:8.3/10 (A good mix of both)

Anyways thats it for my review hopefully you found this helpfull!
Everyone but the killer is lagging: The Game.

I hate this game

But i like it because its like nothing else, its like a drug. You hate it but you keep coming back. Its an a shame this game has so much potential but is plagued by technical issues and bugs. I Disapprove of the Moderation teams response to these issues as updates are frequent and usually don't improve upon major technical issues.

Do you like trolling random people online? Do you greatly enjoy easy, generally unearned victories and getting lots of fake internet bucks for winning one? Do you enjoy running around in a circle around a single rock for three minutes straight as a consumate display of skill and intelligence? Then you will love playing survivor in Dead by Daylight - where neither of those pesky 'skill' nor 'intelligence' things are required to reliably beat, and even dab on and troll, your opponents, and the devs design everything to make you happy at the expense of the minority.


What's that? You want to play Killer? Well, ask yourself this. Are you:
A) A cenobite-tier masochist?
B) A NEET with literally thousands of hours to spend learning the extremely difficult tricks of one of the three to four good killers in the entire game that can compete with survivors who are trying at all?
C) Capable of enjoying a game where you'll get maybe one good, horror-feeling match over the course of dozens of games, half of which will be filled with metacommuninicating friend groups who will spend the entire time permablinding you and calling you slurs in the postgame chat?

If the answer to these three questions is 'no', congratulations, you're a reasonable person and shouldn't play this game.

Es un juego bastante divertido, ideal para pasar un buen rato y unos buenos sustos agradables con los amigos, y muy poca toxicidad en la comunidad. :3

No matter how many times I get camped, tunnel'd, slugged or farmed I can't seem to stop playing. Something about this game keeps me playing, sure it has imbalances on the killer and survivor side and some maps and perks and items are "broken" or "op" but if you can get over losing matches and dying constantly at the start and get to the point where you can see improvements and learn new "techs" and ways to outsmart and outrun the killer or survivors then the game offers a somewhat satisfying sense to it. 

Also the community is like any other, you get some people who are "toxic" and will try to patronise the killer after the game or comment on their profiles telling them to uninstall etc. However on the better side I have met most of my close friends through this game and the community is very active and interesting. 

In conclusion, the game is not perfect but if you can get past the learning curve and the toxic people and enjoy seeing yourself improve and meet new people to play with then this game is for you.
os graficos ainda podem melhor mas a proposta é bem legal. A jogabilidade é boa e o tutorial é um dos mais completos que já fiz.
very fun co-op experience and very enjoyable with friends

So for new players expect one thing. You will die a lot from killers with bullshit perks and you having none. People memorize the maps and know where you are. They come straight to you and it almost looks like hacking, but it tends to be memorization. So be ready for rage, hate, and annoyance with players hiding and doing nothing then magically getting more points than you. Long time players might say "Oh this guy is just full of it with only 18hrs. Don't listen to him!" These are people with hundreds or thousands of hours and also memorize the maps and have all the really good perks. Starting out and for countless hours you will despise this game. The only reason I'd even say give it a chance is if you have a FULL GROUP of people and like to mess around and NOT win the game. Do that and its tolerable. Play solo or duo and you WILL rage. 

They have so many server side lag issues and bugs. Jump through a window to escape? Doesn't matter, the killer can time the hit to still get you 4ft from the window. Drop a pallet or jump over it to escape? Same thing, killer still gets a hit. "Meg can outrun most killers" Totally wrong. You can outrun the killers nobody plays, so I guess then you can correctly say that. But don't count on getting away on actual played killers. 

To end this. If you're a long time player with multiple accounts then you will love this game. If you're a new player who saw someone play it and wanted to try it, then you are going to hate it! Devs don't listen to the majority of players, just the top 1% of killers who say "games go too fast, make it harder for survivors!" So they do and top ranks are longer games, but us lower and new players get absolutely destroyed by these so called 'fixes'. I play because someone else wants me to. I have never and will never play this game solo or recommend it to be played by anyone I know or meet. EVER!

The devs have an extreme survivor bias. Been rank 1 survivor and rank 1 killer for two years in a row, every month, and it's more than apparent.

Survivor queues are anywhere from around 5 to 20 minutes in medium to low ranks.

Killer queues are instant no matter what. Go figure.

The things that need fixed:

- [Maps] Map size: Maps are too big, gens get done on certain maps before the killer can even reach them (especially after the removal of the Perk Hex: Ruin)
- [Offering] Mori's: They need to be removed or need to be changed so that a killer can only mori after the second hook, not the first. This way survivors won't feel cheated out of a win.
- [Item] Purple/Pink Keys: Need to be removed, early hatch escapes are ridiculous and steal away games from the killer. 
- [Perk] Decisive Strike: Needs to be severely changed so that the killer won't be cheated out of a win when they have the chance to pick up a survivor that was unhooked far away from them and happens to be downed again in a short span of being unhooked.
- [Servers]: Dedicated servers are a blight and obviously don't work as intended due to hitbox glitching and being hit as survivor / hitting as killer when you're really not supposed to.

If the bulletpoints above are fixed, I would unironically play this game every single day. As of currently, I can barely stand to play either sides without dying of boredom or frustration for longer than a few matches.
I have a hate/love relationship with this game. It is one of the most infuriating and broken games I ever played, but it's still fun somehow.
